Description:
Affordable and Friendly
This warm hearted country home situated on a lovely elevated corner block is an opportunity you will not want to miss. Landscaped and in excellent condition throughout.
Boasting three good sized bedrooms all with built in robes and a reverse cycle split system in the main bedroom. The spacious lounge room is flooded with sunlight from large bay windows.
The kitchen is fully tiled and in excellent condition with gas cook top, electric oven, corner pantry and good bench space. It boasts a separate dining area flooded with natural light from stunning bay windows, which overlook the front gardens. Carpet, tiles, window furnishings, and flooring are all in excellent order. There is a separate gas heater and second reverse split system air con for year-round comfort. Dining area opens outside to a relaxing paved outdoor entertaining area covered by a shade cloth pergola. Fully enclosed back yard with a garden shed and single powered carport.
All situated on a 457m2 corner block in a much sought after Kangaroo Flat locale - close to transport, shopping and schools.
Currently tenanted to a great tenant but vacant possession can be arranged at the end of the current tenancy, which is finishing soon.
This beautiful property appeals to all buyers and investors, do not miss your opportunity to secure this excellent home.
Insights: 31 Pattison Drive, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Address: Lot 14 Wireless Street Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Your New Residential Community
NO BAL's required, TITLES AVAILABLE NOW.
This newly completed land estate in Kangaroo Flat offers everything you need in a new residential community. Located in walking distance to everything Kangaroo Flat has to offer including shops, schools, bus stops, train station, sporting facilities and parks, only an 8 minute drive to the Bendigo CBD and on the Melbourne side of town what is not to like? With lots ranging from 304m2 to 497m2 all fully serviced and in a secured private community which offers maintenance of the common areas. Wireless Street Gardens would be a fantastic location for a host of buyers including first home buyers, professionals and retirees. Titles available so the lots can settle as soon as required also with house and land packages available from local builders!!
With only 5 Lots remaining, please contact us today to arrange an onsite inspection.
For further information follow the links to Wireless Street Gardens (WSG) website and the Body Corporate website

Description:
Quality 3 bedroom home
This superbly presented Metricon designed home will suit a variety of buyers from families, investors ....through to retirees.
Perfectly positioned on the block, this home takes advantage of the morning sun through large windows in the kitchen/living areas, which also overlook the patio and rear yard, making this ideal for entertaining or simply relaxing.
The kitchen is stylish with elegant pendant lighting over an L-shaped island stone bench including breakfast bar, plus stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop and dishwasher.
The master bedroom has a TV point and ample room for a chaise to create a tranquil sanctuary.
Walk-in robe and twin basins to ensuite complete the package, whilst the other 2 bedrooms have built-in robes.
Outdoor living can be enjoyed undercover where plenty of space exists for alfresco dining and living, and the backyard is thoughtfully landscaped with hardy plants bordering the lawn.
Other features include year round comfort with ducted evaporative cooling keeping summer under control, and ducted gas heating for warm cosy winters.
The remote-controlled double lock up garage has internal access to the home. Fully fenced yard with side access and a garden shed. The location is ideal - close to a primary school, around the corner from secondary!
With all Kangaroo Flat amenities at your fingertips, this home is a must to inspect.
Insights: 24 Freeman Drive, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Too cute! Fully renovated 3BR home
Every now and then we come across a property that has that little bit of something extra....It's more like a feel or a vibe than anything else. Well, this 3 bedroom home has it! This cute weatherboard has been fully renovated inside and out. It could almost be considered new when you look at the list of things that have been done including: re-wiring, re-plumbing, new hot water service, new large kitchen (open plan) with new dishwasher, bench tops, new tile floor, new carpets in the bedrooms and lounge, new fresh looking bathroom, each of the bedrooms has a built-in robe, it's been painted inside and out in light natural tones, there's a new side fence, a new roller door and single carport with vehicle access to the huge 614m2 backyard. An added bonus is you also get a new front loader washing machine! Gas heating and a split system for cooling keep the climate just right throughout the year. On the Melbourne side of Bendigo, close to Kangaroo Flat CBD, Lansell Square, schools, child care facilities, medical clinics, parks and recreation facilities; this home offers a great package for first home buyers, retirees, investors and small families. Take the time to inspect this property now before it's gone. Estimated rental $265 per week.
Insights: 16 Woolcock Avenue, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Address: Unit 9, Karinya Gardens (1 - 11 Furness Street) Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Walk to local amenities
This beautifully presented home is a great opportunity to secure an independent lifestyle. Positioned in a quiet pocket of the Karinya Gardens retirement village, and only minutes from Lansell Square shopping precinct, this property will certainly catch the attention of those wanting convenience with a fuss-free lifestyle.
Offering 2 bedrooms, the main has two built-in robes and a ceiling fan, whilst the second bedroom has a built-in robe and ceiling fan also. The bright and airy light-filled kitchen is well equipped with a electric oven and cook-top, pantry and plenty of storage, and overlooks the dining and lounge area. Other features include a good-sized lounge with quality block-out drapes and split-system heating and cooling throughout for year-round comfort. Outside has low maintenance gardens with 2 garden sheds and room for a 2-car tandem carport. The outdoor patio area is perfect for alfresco dining or simply enjoying an early morning coffee. Downsize in comfort in this well-established, friendly community with walking tracks along the creek and the bonus of caring and thoughtful neighbours. Only minutes to Crusoe reservoir, bus stop and local amenities, this property is a must to inspect!

Description:
HUGE ALLOTMENT WITH HEAPS OF POTENTIAL
Situated on over 4300 sq mts the opportunities here are endless. With the size of the allotment this property provides potential for subdivision (STCA). The home features 4 bedrooms, main with ensuite, formal lounge, rumpus room with a built in bar, large light filled updated kitchen/meals area with modern appliances, family sized bathroom and laundry with excellent storage. There's a great shedding with the triple bay garage plus a colorbond workshop with plumbed hot and cold water and pot belly stove. If you are looking for a property with development prospects or just a great family home with heaps of space then an inspection is a must.
Please note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
CHOICE COURT LOCALE
This great entry-level property located close to all amenities and public transport is an ideal first home or investment proposition.
Generous accommodation includes 4 bedrooms, L-shaped formal lounge /dining room, open plan kitchen/meals and family living room. The galley-style kitchen features gas/electric cooking, dishwasher, double pantry cupboard and island breakfast bar dividing it from the meals area.
The main bedroom includes a walk-in robe and ensuite while remaining bedrooms are conveniently located beside the main bathroom with the large laundry and WC off the kitchen/meals.
Ducted evaporative cooling complemented by ceiling fans throughout keeps everything cool in summer while two gas heaters take care of winter chills.
Outside, a large covered and paved alfresco area features protective shade blinds rendering it suitable for year-round use.
The large block approx 995m² includes double carport with gates through to garage/workshop in the low maintenance backyard.

Description:
PERFECT FOR FIRST HOME, INVESTOR OR DOWNSIZER
Situated on a corner block in a peaceful location, is this 3 bedroom home ready to buy. A tiled entrance leads you to the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, to the left. A versatile floor plan could allow for 2 spacious living areas and a formal dining room or even 3 living spaces. The well appointed kitchen includes walk in pantry, dishwasher, gas upright stove and spacious meals area. Off the kitchen/meals area is a hallway leading to 2 further bedrooms, family bathroom with separate toilet and laundry with storage. The meals area opens onto an outdoor entertaining space overlooking a fernery. The storage space outside is an added bonus to this property. There is a double carport with roller door as well as a large undercover space to the side of this, perfect for a caravan, boat or extra cars. A 6x8 shed with concrete floor and power completes the package. The home is located close to the bush and walking trails as well as local schools and shops.
